title: Green Tea with Orange and Spices

ingredients.content: 10 gram fresh root ginger, peeled, cut in round slices (2 mm)
3 oranges, peeled and quartered, pith removed

preparations.content: Place ginger, mint and oranges in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place water, teabags, cinnamon and turmeric in mixing bowl then heat <b>12 min/100°C//speed <b>. Remove teabags, then add reserved orange mixture and stir with spatula.
Strain tea mixture into a large serving jug or teapot. Serve hot, or leave to cool if preferred.
